tests.name: A) Oven add-on pricing (must hit)
tests.question: How much extra is the oven add-on?

tests.name: B) Service area (must hit)
tests.question: Do you cover Brisbane inner north?

tests.name: C) Supplies/equipment (must hit)
tests.question: Do I need to supply anything or do you bring gear?

tests.question: Do you do carpet steam cleaning?
